channel.title: Runescape - Changing passwords
channel.description:
My friend has recently quit runescape and give me his account.
So, I went to the page that allows you to change your password and realized I needed the email and password to that email so I could change the password. So, I asked my friend and he said he had forgotten the password. Is there anyway I can change the password now?
Sorry if it doesn't really sound clear, but I would really appreciate some help.
Thanks!

item.title: Runescape - Changing passwords
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

go to account help and ask for a manual recovery

Read full topic
